title: Problems with 7.1
body:
Having issues with a blackscreen when the in game loading screen launches as well as sudden frame drops.

Any idea how to fix?? Especially the blackscreen on startup. It's ruining games by preventing me from helping my team.

replies.body:
Is this the same issue that happened last week that we had up on our [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/)? If so, try the **ALT+ENTER** keystroke workaround once you see the loading screen pop up, as it will toggle you out of fullscreen mode and should serve as a workaround for now.

If you experience further issues with this or your framerate after using that workaround, or if you aren't experiencing that known issue, let me know.

I don't think its the same issue because it only happens if I alt + Tab into the game/loading screen. If im tabbed out, the game doesnt launch and when I try to tab back in, I am met with a black screen, forcing me to close out the client or, more commonly, restart my system completely.
Does the issue still happen if you **don't** ALT+TAB during the loading screen?
I don't think so. I have yet to have it happen without ALT + TAB. I have also yet to check on 7.2.

Gotcha. The reason I ask is because Alt+Tabbing while your client is loading up assets, and trying to connect to our gameservers will often cause a lot of problems, including the issue you're having. I **strongly recommend** avoiding Alt+Tabbing during the loading screen (at least until you see all the splash arts and such show up) in the future.

If you have any questions, please let me know.
